description:
Crif Group, international group active in the field of information and banking services,  is currently seeking for its Moscow office a:

 Software Developer

 to support its growth in the Russian Federation. This represents an opportunity to join an international environment and facilitate expansion of the company.

 

Responsibilities include:

  • Interpret written business requirements and technical specification documents.
  • Perform coding to written technical specifications.
  • Take care of Web-services implementation
  • Ensure DB integration
  • Performs related duties as assigned

The ideal candidate will posses the following qualifications:

  • University or High School degree in IT related field
  • Knowledge of XSLT, XML
  • Knowledge of one of the following languages: Java, C#, С++
  • SQL basics
  • Ability to work well within a team and demonstrate flexible attitude
  • Some basic knowledge of English is plus

 

 

We are looking for people with a competitive and winning attitude that thrive on building new project initiatives.

 This is an excellent opportunities to work for an international market leader in the field, that offers great working relationships and satisfaction.

 If you are a qualified candidate and are interested in a challenging position with a growing organization that values its employees, this is the position for you.
name: Java Developer
